name: The Giant Bomber
description:
The Giant Bomber is the unknown backstory of the Giant Bomb mascot. Join him on his dangerous quest for redemption. This is a puzzle game made with unity.

Hope you have as much fun playing it as i did!

CONTROLS: Use the arrow keys to move and space to explode. Use p to hold a block and move it with the arrow keys

REMEMBER : You can explode only twice in a level. Pick up bombs to refill the explodometer. Red Bombs give you two exploding chances , black bombs give you one. Get to the green square ender to finish the level.
